title: The Asset Allocator: I Love Studies
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: I like studies – which in the investment domain are typically based on surveys of large numbers of people – because they provide an opportunity to avoid making common mistakes. This podcast (4:15) argues that just as doctors, with a front-row view of new medical research, were first to quit smoking, financial advisors at the forefront of investment research benefit from a commitment to remain on the cutting edge of advancements in their field. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
